description: The enumeration of the possible reason for a notification email quarantine
name: EmailQuarantineReason

enum.name: PERMANENT_BOUNCE
enum.description: Messages were hard bounced from the email address

enum.name: TRANSIENT_BOUNCE
enum.description: Messages were bounced temporarly from the email address

enum.name: COMPLAINT
enum.description: Complaints were received for messages delivered to the email address

enum.name: OTHER
enum.description: Other uncategorized reason, might be an unrecognized bounce type
